message.body: Happy east coast thanksgiving b! Love from the peterson/wesleys. are you still in boston-ish this weekend? Ill be there with brother john
Hey m'lady. I'll be in boston maybe tomorrow... Will you be around?
Yes. May be in harvard sq mid to late afternoon. Ill keep you posted
What's your plan, miss? We will be in Boston after dinnertime or so. Would you be available Then?
Headed down soon. Afternoon in harvard sq. dinner with lizas fam. Not sure what after. Ill be in touch!
Brotha john is psyched to see you. We'll make it happen. Lemme know when youre headed in!
For sure! So so excited!
When are you available? Bc we're very flexible
Probably not until 9:30 or 10:00 after the meet the parents meal. Where are you now?
We're at emily's house in natick just hanging out but it's like 20 minutes out
In which direction?
West of boston
Great. Not sure if well go downtown or be in cambridge/somerville. Let you know
We prefer cheaper if possible, like in Cambridge... But you know we'll figure it out
B i know it.
We'll wait to hear from you to know where we're doing so maybe give us a little arrival time?
Is that a plan?
Yes yes, we're just leaving :)
Perfect!
Slight delay, on our way
Great. See you soon!
Where you guys at now?
10 min away, sorry for the hold up
No worries! Just trying to figure out logistics. See you soon
Safely back? So magical to see you twice in two weeks. More more!!
I was thinking the same. :) I just arrived home and am beginning the nap process...! Your turn to find me farther south m'lady.
Ill work on it!
